channel.title: Comments on: 2008 Movie Wrap-up
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description:
JCVD is really that good huh? HBO has been carrying a Jean Claude Van Damme revue lately. I watched Maximum Risk. About half way through I had to throw up from the dizziness that is Maximum Risk but. . .it was there.
I would push Wall-E to the top spot (if I had the 10 films you listed at my disposal).
item.content:encoded:
JCVD is really that good huh? HBO has been carrying a Jean Claude Van Damme revue lately. I watched Maximum Risk. About half way through I had to throw up from the dizziness that is Maximum Risk but. . .it was there.

I would push Wall-E to the top spot (if I had the 10 films you listed at my disposal).
